headline: Blackstone Announces Agreement to Acquire Hill Top Energy Center in Western Pennsylvania for Nearly $1 Billion
summary: NEW YORK, September 15, 2025--Blackstone (NYSE: BX) announced today that private equity funds affiliated with Blackstone Energy Transition Partners (collectively, "Blackstone Energy Transition Partners") have entered into a definitive agreement to acquire Hill Top Energy Center ("Hill Top"), a 620-megawatt natural gas power plant in Western Pennsylvania for nearly $1 billion, from Ardian, a global private investment firm.

raw.headline: Blackstone Announces Agreement to Acquire Hill Top Energy Center in Western Pennsylvania for Nearly $1 Billion
raw.summary: NEW YORK, September 15, 2025--Blackstone (NYSE: BX) announced today that private equity funds affiliated with Blackstone Energy Transition Partners (collectively, "Blackstone Energy Transition Partners") have entered into a definitive agreement to acquire Hill Top Energy Center ("Hill Top"), a 620-megawatt natural gas power plant in Western Pennsylvania for nearly $1 billion, from Ardian, a global private investment firm.

headline: Does Blackstone’s Planned $4.3B Spain Data Center Expansion Justify Its Current Price?
summary: If you have Blackstone on your radar, you are definitely not alone. This stock has been on quite the run, and investors are paying close attention. In the last year alone, Blackstone shares have surged 20.5%, building on an impressive 5-year rally that clocks in at 316.9%. Even just over the past week, the stock is up 4.6%, and there is no shortage of news fueling both interest and debate among market watchers. Headlines have recently highlighted Blackstone’s additional investment of EUR 4.3...
